Package it.polimi.ingsw.server

Class ActiveGameManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.ActiveGameManager
public abstract class ActiveGameManager extends Object
Class responsible for managing the active game running on the server.

  • Constructor Details

    • ActiveGameManager

      public ActiveGameManager()

  • Method Details

    • saveGame

      public static void saveGame()
      Saves the current active game state to a file.
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - when trying to save a game that does not exist.

    • loadGame

      public static void loadGame(String fileName, String player)
      Loads a saved game from file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - name of the file to load.
      player - name of the player trying to load the game.
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - when player is not whitelisted or when another game is already in progress or being setup.

    • startGame

      public static void startGame()
      Starts a new game.
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - when a game is already in progress or the lobby is not full.

    • getActiveGameInstance

      public static Game getActiveGameInstance()
      Returns:
      the current game running on the server.

    • joinGame

      public static void joinGame(String username)
      Joins a player in the lobby.
      Parameters:
      username - player's username.
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - when:
      • No lobby has been found
      • The active lobby is full
      • Another player in the lobby has the same name
      • Trying to join a whitelisted game

    • leaveGame

      public static void leaveGame(String username)
      Remove a player from the game.
      Parameters:
      username - username of the player that left the game/disconnected.
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - when no lobby has been found or player is not in a lobby.

    • getDisconnectedPlayers

      public static Set<String> getDisconnectedPlayers()
      Returns:
      the set of disconnected players.

    • getConnectedPlayers

      public static Set<String> getConnectedPlayers()
      Returns:
      the set of connected players.

    • stopGame

      public static void stopGame()
      Terminates the current game emptying the lobby.
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - when trying to stop a game that doesn't exist.

    • setLobbySize

      public static void setLobbySize(int size)
      Sets the number of players necessary to start a game.
      Parameters:
      size - size of the lobby.
      Throws:
      IllegalActionException - when a game is already in progress or when the size is not within the acceptable range.

    • canStartGame

      public static boolean canStartGame()
      Check if a game can start.
      Returns:
      true if the game can be started, false if lobby is not full or if a game is already in progress.

    • existsActiveLobby

      public static boolean existsActiveLobby()
      Returns:
      true if a lobby exists.

    • isGameInProgress

      public static boolean isGameInProgress()
      Checks if a game is in progress.
      Returns:
      true if a game is in progress.
